All Classes

Class Description
AddBook
Adds a new book to the library.
AddBookWindow  
AddPatron
Adds a new patron to the library.
Book
Book class models a book in the library.
BookDataManager
BookDataManager class is used to load and store Book data using the text file storage.
BorrowBook
Executes the actions needed to lend a book to a patron.
Command
The Command interface models an action that occurs as a result of a command given by the user.
CommandParser
CommandParser class is used to parse the input given by the user through the application's command line interface.
DataManager
An object that loads and stores data to the text file storage.
Help
Displays a help message to the user.
Library
Library class models the whole library.
LibraryData
LibraryData class is responsible for loading data to and storing data from the library, using the text file storage.
LibraryException
LibraryException extends Exception class and is a custom exception that is used to notify the user about errors or invalid commands.
ListBooks
Shows a list of all library books to the user.
ListPatrons
Shows a list of all patrons of the library to the user.
LoadGUI
Starts the GUI of the application.
Loan
Loan class models an object that holds information about a book that is on loan.
LoanDataManager
LoanDataManager class is used to load and store Loan data using the text file storage.
Main
The Main class of the application.
MainWindow  
Patron
Patron class models a patron (member) of the library.
PatronDataManager
PatronDataManager class is used to load and store Patron data using the text file storage.
RenewBook
Renews a book that is already on loan to a patron.
ReturnBook
Returns a book to the library.
ShowBook
Shows detailed information about a specific book.
ShowPatron
Shows detailed information about a specific patron.
